content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetZones path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/dns/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/zones content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name pagerequestfirst
desc the number of items desired
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestafter
desc the cursor value after which data will be returned
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestfilter
desc sqlstyle constraint filters
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestsortby
desc sort the response by the given field
in query
required false
schema
type str
sum get all zones
responses
200
zonegetzonesresponse
type obj
props
paginationpageinfo
type obj
props
totalcount
type str
desc the total number of items in the dataset
haspreviouspage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not a previous page of data exists
hasnextpage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not another page of data is available
startcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the first item in the set of data returned
endcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the last item in the set of data returned
desc information about a paginated response

this is modeled after the graphql relay spec to support both cursor based pagination and traditional offset based pagination
zones
type arr
zonezone
type obj
props
stackid
type str
desc the id of the stack that a zone belongs to
accountid
type str
desc the id of the stackpath account that owns a zone
id
type str
desc a zones unique id
domain
type str
desc a zones name
version
type str
desc a zones version number

version numbers are incremented automatically when a zone is updated
labels
type str
desc a key/value pair of userdefined labels for a zone

zone labels are not processed by stackpath and are solely used for users to organize their dns zones
created
type str
format datetime
desc the date a zone was created
updated
type str
format datetime
desc the date a zone was last updated
nameservers
type str
desc the hostnames of the stackpath resolvers that host a zone

every zone has multiple name servers assigned by stackpath upon creation for redundancy purposes
verified
type str
format datetime
desc the date a zones nameservers were last audited by stackpath
zonezonestatus
type str
default active
disabled
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not a zone has been disabled by the user
desc a dns zone

a zone represents an individual domain in stackpaths dns infrastructure
desc the requested dns zones
desc a response from a request to retrieve all dns zones in a stack
title: 37_Zones_GetZones_214.json
